title: Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 16
description:
Criticism of Capitalism and Globalization - Collection 16:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Aschoff - The New Prophets of Capital (2015)

-  Atzeni (Ed.) - Workers and Labour in a Globalised Capitalism; Contemporary Themes and Theoretical Issues (2014)

-  Bevir & Trentmann (Eds.) - Critiques of Capital in Modern Britain and America; Transatlantic Exchanges 1800 to the Present Day (2002)

-  Blythman - Swallow This; Serving Up the Food Industry's Darkest Secrets (2015)

-  Boutang - Cognitive Capitalism (2011)

-  Carroll - The Making of a Transnational Capitalist Class; Corporate Power in the 21st Century (2010)

-  Di Muzio - The 1% and the Rest of Us; a Political Economy of Dominant Ownership (2015)

-  Dzarasov - The Conundrum of Russian Capitalism (2014)

-  
Finkel (Ed.) - The Human and Environmental Impact of Fracking; How Fracturing Shale for Gas Affects Us and Our World (2015)

-  Foster - Why We Bite the Invisible Hand; the Psychology of Anti-Capitalism (2014)

-  Goldman - Imperial Nature; the World Bank and Struggles for Social Justice in the Age of Globalization (2005)

-  Gould-Wartofsky - The Occupiers; the Making of the 99 Percent Movement (2015)

-  Haiven - Crises of Imagination, Crises of Power; Capitalism, Creativity and the Commons (2014)

-  Hay - The Failure of Anglo-Liberal Capitalism (2013)

-  Hilferding - Finance Capital; a Study of the Latest Phase of Capitalist Development (1981)

-  Hodgson et al (Eds.) - Capitalism in Evolution; Global Contentions - East and West (2001)

-  Kay - Culture and Prosperity; the Truth About Markets-Why Some Nations Are Rich but Most Remain Poor (2004)

-  Kowalik - From Solidarity to Sellout; the Restoration of Capitalism in Poland (2011)

-  Li - Land's End; Capitalist Relations on an Indigenous Frontier (2014)

-  Malik - Broadbandits; Inside the $750 Billion Telecom Heist (2003)

-  McCully - Ida M. Tarbell; the Woman Who Challenged Big Business - and Won (2014)

-  Melamed - Represent and Destroy; Rationalizing Violence in the New Racial Capitalism (2011)

-  Mendoza - Austerity; the Demolition of the Welfare State and the Rise of the Zombie Economy (2015)

-  Naroff & Scherer - Big Picture Economics; How to Navigate the New Global Economy (2014)

-  Porter - The Rise of Big Business, 1860-1920, 3e (2006)

-  Rich - Foreclosing the Future; The World Bank and the Politics of Environmental Destruction (2013)

-  Ritzer - Globalization; the Essentials (2011)

-  Sasson - Expulsions; Brutality and Complexity in the Global Economy (2014)

-  Sayer - Why We Can't Afford the Rich (2015)

-  Schmidt - Industrial Violence and the Legal Origins of Child Labor (2010)

-  Stander - Why War; Capitalism and the Nation-State (2014)

-  Steger - Globalization; a Very Short Introduction (2013)

-  Yergin & Stanislaw - The Commanding Heights; the Battle Between Government and the Marketplace That Is Making the Modern World (1998)

-  Yun-Shik et al (Eds.) - Korea Confronts Globalization (2009)

-  Zuckerman - The Frackers; the Outrageous Inside Story of the New Billionaire Wildcatters (2013)
